txt.en: The Huorns of Fangorn are special creatures. They hold no hate in their heart and must be saved. Save them from the Orcs and their axes!
Save all eight Huorns in one run
To earn this deed, you must save all eight Huorns in the Fangorn's Edge instance without letting any die.
To earn this deed, you must save all eight Huorns in the Fangorn's Edge instance without letting any die.
You saved all the Huorns in Fangorn's Edge
